keyword: calories in an egg mcmuffin with sausage
title: Calories in an Egg McMuffin with Sausage
meta_description: Discover calories in an egg mcmuffin with sausage, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and sodium for one serving from McDonald's.
h1: Calories in an Egg McMuffin with Sausage
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, sausage patty, egg, cheese; as prepared and served.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion size, and preparation; values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data. Check app or packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One egg McMuffin with sausage provides about 480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 31 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an egg McMuffin with sausage?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for one standard sandwich.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage egg McMuffin?
Does an egg McMuffin with sausage have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 830 mg sodium due to sausage, cheese, and muffin.

faqs.q: How many carbs in an egg McMuffin with sausage?
faqs.a: Roughly 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie version of egg McMuffin with sausage?
